description: Join us for arts, crafts and play activities led by the London Museum as part of their intergenerational Play Cycles programme.

events.name: Drop in: London Museum's Play Cycles
events.notes:
Please let us know if you plan to visit. Doing so allows
                    the venue to plan ahead and you will be notified by email
                    about any changes to the programme that might affect your
                    visit.

factsheet.heading: London Museum's Play Cycles
paragraphs: Our family of pedal powered play units hit the road again this summer to reimagine Londonâ€™s streets as radical places for joy, creativity and gathering.  Each of the three bikes, The Broadcaster, The Explorer, and The Companion brings a range of activities from loose parts play, arts and crafts, music making, and storytelling to the chance to relax with a cup of tea over a board game!
Play Cycles were designed by NOOMA Studio and in partnership with the City of London.

location.address: Smithfield Rotunda Garden, West Smithfield, EC1A 9PT

name: Bartholomew Fayre: Play Cycles
